name: The Edge Of The Empire
description:
This game was made for the VimJam 2 under 10 days with the theme "On The Edge" and the requirement of "Boss". 

Story:

A once great empire has fallen and your job is to protect its last city.

Gameplay && Controls (normal):

Move with WASD and the arrow keys, summon soldiers with the left mouse button while enemies spawn and target you/the city and your soldiers will target them/you. The enemies will spawn more and more frequently. Protect the middle and survive as long as you can.

Gameplay && Controls (sandbox):

Same as normal just without a time counter and you spawn the enemies instead of them spawning automatically.

HAVE FUN!

Credits:

Thanks Alphabet & Type for the font.
